name: Music festivals during a Pandemic?! THOUGHTS?
description: As long as event organizers/coordinators are doing a MUST HAVE PROOF OF VACCINATION or proof of negative covid test within the past 48 hours or something, while also requiring/strongly encouraging masks, I believe everyone has the choice then to decide whether to attend!! We can't keep living in isolation, we are HUMAN and want to LIVE as much as we can in the PRESENT with the unknown time we have left in our lives!

name: Can you trust AI to drive YOU?
description: With the rise of AI integrations and evolutions, we can now expect fully-driven AI vehicles on the road TODAY

name: Graphic cards shortage
description: The sad sad truth is that more technology and inventions use the resources/material that (gaming) graphics cards needs these days!
